title: The Respect Quest [game trailer]
creator_contributor_role: Tea Tree Gully Primary School, creator
abstract: An action/2D Platform game with the aim of restoring respect to the world the Time Master has destroyed. This trailer illustrates how the game is played.
description: Time Monsters are spreading disrespect in the community and causing havoc. Help local villagers and elders restore respect by defeating the Time Monsters with a magic boomerang. Jump on platforms, collect coins and explore through the mountains of time. Money gained on the quest will help rebuild the villages after respect is restored.  This trailer illustrates how the game is played. Under the category 'Primary Games', Tea Tree Gully Primary School's Liam Blake and Christopher Halse, Grade 5, were the Screen It 2011 winners.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2002453; 'Screen It' 2011 [winning entries]; Active; 2011
